name: Home Assistant DesignKit
description:
This DesignKit help you design concepts that match the Home Assistant interface. It's build with Text Styles, Color Styles, Components, Auto Layout and Variants. We make small adjustments and bug fixes to the kit on a regular basis. Got a question or some great suggestions? There are various ways to get in touch home-assistant.io/help/ or leave comment bellow.


Home Assistant is open source home automation that puts local control and privacy first. Powered by a worldwide community of tinkerers and DIY enthusiasts. Perfect to run on a Raspberry Pi or a local server.


If youâ€™re brand new to Figma, they offer some great tutorials and help docs on figma.com/resources/learn-design. There is a free e-learning course on designcode.io/design-system-in-figma.
